title: Rosemary Ferguson on how the Primrose Hill set sobered up: 'A big night on a Friday, it’s less common now'
text:
When I ask if a recent Instagram outing on the Orient Express with her friends Sadie Frost and Kate Moss involved alcohol, Rosemary Ferguson politely ducks the question. But it’s safe to say, times have changed for what was once known as the Primrose Hill set - who were once the very embodiment of sex, drugs and rock n roll .

Some of their bright and beautiful number have tragically died, like Alexander McQueen and his close friend Annabelle Neilson, others have had public falls from grace followed by post rehab sober resurrections, like the ex Dior, now Martin Margiela designer John Galliano.

Ferguson’s friend and once the British poster girl for bad behaviour - Kate Moss - gave up drinking...
description: When I ask if a recent Instagram outing on the Orient Express with her friends Sadie Frost and Kate Moss involved alcohol, Rosemary Ferguson politely ducks the question.
